origin: There are two ways of installing OpenCV on your machine: download prebuilt version for your platform or compile from sources.
local: 在您的计算机上安装OpenCV有两种方法:下载平台的预构建版本或从源代码处编译.

origin: In many cases you can find prebuilt version of OpenCV that will meet your needs.
local: 在许多情况下,您可以找到满足您需求的预构建版本的OpenCV.

origin: Packages for Android, iOS and Windows built with default parameters and recent compilers are published for each release, they do not contain
local: Android、iOS和Windows的软件包使用默认参数和最新的编译器构建,每个版本都会发布,它们不包含

origin: Other organizations and people maintain their own binary distributions of OpenCV. For example:
local: 其他组织和人员维护自己的OpenCV二进制发行版.例如:

origin: System packages in popular Linux distributions (
local: 流行Linux发行版中的系统包(
Build from sources(从源代码生成)

origin: It can happen that existing binary packages are not applicable for your use case, then you'll have to build custom version of OpenCV by yourself. This section gives a high-level overview of the build process, check tutorial for specific platform for actual build instructions.
local: 可能现有的二进制软件包不适用于您的用例,那么您必须自己构建OpenCV的定制版本.本节提供了构建过程的高级概述,请参阅教程以了解具体平台的实际构建说明.

origin: build management system for configuration and build, so this section mostly describes generalized process of building software with CMake.
local: 构建配置和构建的管理系统,因此本节主要描述用CMake构建软件的一般过程.

origin: Install C++ compiler and build tools. On *NIX platforms it is usually GCC/G++ or Clang compiler and Make or Ninja build tool. On Windows it can be Visual Studio IDE or MinGW-w64 compiler. Native toolchains for Android are provided in the Android NDK. XCode IDE is used to build software for OSX and iOS platforms.
local: 安装C++编译器和构建工具.在*NIX平台上,它通常是GCC/G++或Clang编译器和Make或Ninja构建工具.在Windows上,它可以是visualstudioide或MinGW-w64编译器.Android NDK中提供了Android的原生工具链.XCode IDE用于为OSX和iOS平台构建软件.

origin: Install CMake from the official site or some other source.
local: 从官方网站或其他来源安装CMake.

origin: Get other third-party dependencies: libraries with extra functionality like decoding videos or showing GUI elements; libraries providing optimized implementations of selected algorithms; tools used for documentation generation and other extras. Check
local: 获取其他第三方依赖项:具有解码视频或显示GUI元素等额外功能的库；提供选定算法的优化实现的库；用于生成文档和其他附加功能的工具.检查

origin: for available options and corresponding dependencies.
local: 获取可用选项和相应的依赖项.

origin: Typical software project consists of one or several code repositories. OpenCV have two repositories with code:
local: 典型的软件项目由一个或多个代码库组成. OpenCV有两个代码库:

origin: - main repository with stable and actively supported algorithms and
local: 具有稳定且积极支持的算法和

origin: which contains experimental and non-free (patented) algorithms; and one repository with test data:
local: 包含实验性和非自由(专利)算法；以及一个包含测试数据的存储库:

origin: If you want to build software using more than one repository, make sure all components are compatible with each other. For OpenCV it means that
local: 如果要使用多个存储库构建软件,请确保所有组件彼此兼容.对于OpenCV,这意味着

origin: repositories must be checked out at the same tag or that all snapshot archives are downloaded from the same release.
local: 必须在同一标记处签出存储库,或者从同一版本下载所有快照存档.

origin: When choosing which version to download take in account your target platform and development tools versions, latest versions of OpenCV can have build problems with very old compilers and vice versa. We recommend using latest release and fresh OS/compiler combination.
local: 在选择要下载的版本时,请考虑您的目标平台和开发工具版本,最新版本的OpenCV可能会在非常旧的编译器上出现构建问题,反之亦然.我们建议使用最新版本和最新的OS/编译器组合.

origin: At this step CMake will verify that all necessary tools and dependencies are available and compatible with the library and will generate intermediate files for the chosen build system. It could be Makefiles, IDE projects and solutions, etc. Usually this step is performed in newly created build directory:
